scenario_text.value: Excuse me, did something happen here?

There was a landslide up ahead around dawn,
so the road’s been sealed off.

Oh, that must be the one we read about online
earlier...
Um, did anyone get caught up in the incident?

We’re about to look into it, among other
aspects. So no one can pass.
Seems we can’t get through here...
What’s the plan? Should we head back for now?

Don’t talk outta your ass or you’ll regret
it!
(Huh? I can hear someone kicking up a fuss.)
